/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling scene from a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is flanked by towering buildings, their facades adorned with a myriad of advertisements and billboards, reflecting the vibrant commercial culture of the city. Cars and buses traverse the road, adding to the dynamic energy of the scene. Pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, contributing to the lively atmosphere. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft, diffused light over the scene. The predominant colors in the image are shades of gray and green, painting a picture of a city that is both modern and rooted in tradition.
